EmailTemplate.description: SEO Renewal Contract for existing Organic clients
EmailTemplate.name: Organic Renewal
EmailTemplate.subject: Yodle SEO Services - Please "Accept"
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Client_First_Name__c},
This email confirms that you are extending the term of your Yodle Organic Services (the “SEO Term”) by an additional {!Case.Term_months__c} months and to add optimization of {!Case.KeyWord_2__c} additional keywords. As noted below, to accept this Change Order, please reply to this e-mail with "Accept" in the body.
This Change Order changes the Agreement currently in effect between Yodle and Customer, as set forth herein.
The SEO Term is extended by an additional {!Case.Term_months__c} months and will continue month to month thereafter until the Agreement is terminated or Customer cancels the Yodle Organic services. Customer may not cancel the Yodle Organic services during the SEO Term.
The Yodle Organic services will be changed to add the optimization of {!Case.KeyWord_2__c} additional keywords. As a result of this change, the Yodle Organic services include the optimization of {!Case.KeyWord_3__c} keywords.
The monthly fee for the Yodle Organic services, as amended by this Change Order, will be {!Case.Budget__c} per month effective immediately.
Except as modified by this Change Order, all of the terms and provision of the Agreement remain in full force and effect.
Customer accepts this Change Order by replying to this e-mail with “Accept”. This action creates an electronic signature that has the same legal force and effect as a handwritten signature on a written contract under any applicable law or regulation, and is equally binding.
Please contact your Yodle sales representative if you have any questions.
Sincerely,
Yodle Contracts Team contracts@yodle.com
Date: {!Case.CreatedDate} Email: {!Case.SuppliedEmail} Client ID: {!Case.Client_ID__c} Yodle Representative: {!Case.Submitted_By__c}
{!Case.CaseNumber}
Privacy Policy | Terms of Use
Yodle Inc. Headquarters 50 West 23rd Street, 4th Floor, NY, NY 10010
